articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Whoopi Goldberg apologizes for using Romani slur on ABC’s The View - The Guardian
articles.description: ‘I’m really, really sorry,’ the actor said, nearly a year after she was suspended from her show for saying the Holocaust ‘isn’t about race’
articles.content:
Whoopi Goldberg has issued an apology following her use of a racial slur during an episode of ABCs The View.
On Wednesday, Goldberg used a derogatory term associated with Romani people while discuss… [+1654 chars]

articles.title: Jennifer Aniston dazzles on red carpet in Paris after she accidentally swore on This Morning - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Friends actress, 54, dazzled in a sparkling gown on the red carpet with her Murder Mystery 2 co-star Adam Sandler - after she made headlines for accidentally swearing on This Morning.
